name: flood-mapper
description: A GBDX task that maps flood water on 4-band or 8-band atmospherically compensated DigitalGlobe imagery.

inputPortDescriptors.name: image
inputPortDescriptors.description: Contains input image. The input image must be a 4/8-band atmospherically-compensated multispectral image. If more than one images are contained in this directory, one is picked arbitrarily.

inputPortDescriptors.name: tolerance
inputPortDescriptors.description: A percentage value. High tolerance picks up everything with a detectable concentration of moisture or surface water. Intermediate tolerance picks up water-saturated soils and other materials. Low tolerance picks up only impure water bodies. Default is 50.

inputPortDescriptors.name: min_size
inputPortDescriptors.description: Minimum target area in m2. Default is 1000.

inputPortDescriptors.name: min_width
inputPortDescriptors.description: Minimum target width in m2. Default is 10.

inputPortDescriptors.name: confidence
inputPortDescriptors.description: Minimum confidence to determine flood water pixel. Default is 1.
